description:
Description


WHY VITAL SPRAY SERUM? — Join the 40 millions who trust the global Best Seller Facial Mist, known for its quick & strong soothing touch that calms and refreshes your skin with every spray.
CALM & REFRESH — Soothe and refresh your skin with a burst of calming hydration that takes away stress and irritation in a sprtiz.
ULTIMATE VERSATALITY — Switch it up as a toner, refreshing mist, or setting spray for versatile hydration and a soothing finish.
TRUFFEROL + RED FLOWER BLENDING OIL — Combines antioxidant-rich Italian white truffle extract and Vitamin E with revitalizing red flower oils for a calming touch of radiant skin.
PROVEN RESULTS — Clinically shown to improve UV irritation and refine skin texture, leaving you with a smoother, more resilient complexion.
SULFATE-FREE COMFORT — Perfect for sensitive skin, this formula soothes and hydrates without any harsh surfactants.
 
How To Use

After cleansing/toning, shake the bottle and mist evenly over the face.
Pat the serum into the skin to aid absorption.
 
Key Ingredients

Jasmine Extract: Gives sufficient moisture and cooling effects to your skin
Avocado Oil: Has anti-aging benefits that improves skin elasticity
Lavender Extract: Improves skin health by aiding in minimizing acne and wrinkles and making your skin glow

description:
Description


A daily facial toner packed with moisturizing and nourishing power that refines skin texture into a velvety-smooth surface and boosts performance of the rest of the skincare routine.
Fluid infused with rich essence retexturizes skin in a velvety-smooth finish, creating clearer, brighter and cleaner skin.
Well-balanced skin moisture creates pathway in skin to maximize absorption and effects of the rest of the skincare routine and Quick absorption into skin leaves a silky-smooth yet freshly moisturized finish.
 
How To Use

Use in the morning and at night right after cleansing and as beginning of the skincare routine.
Wet cotton pad with generous amount or take product directly on palms.
Apply gently over entire face for even absorption into skin.
 
Key Ingredients

Great for daily use thanks to a gentle exfoliant PHA.
14 botanical soothing ingredients rapidly cools and comforts hot, sensitive skin.
Sophora Flavescens Root or Kushen has a bitter taste and cooling properties, and it has been widely used in traditional skincare as bathing water or powder treatment.

original_name: [d'Alba] White Truffle First Aromatic Spray Serum 120ml

description:
Description


[600,000PPM REAL COLLAGEN] With 60% pure collagen, this facial serum spray supports firm, healthy skin. The ultra-low molecular weight collagen absorbs effectively, enhancing elasticity and revitalizing texture for a youthful look.
[HYDRATION THAT LASTS ALL DAY] Provides lasting hydration with a lightweight, non-sticky formula that locks in moisture. Perfect for quick refreshes, it keeps skin dewy and comfortable throughout the day.
[RADIANT, GLOWING COMPLEXION] The collagen & vitamin C-infused face mist boosts radiance and promotes an even skin tone. Reduces the look of dullness and uneven texture for a smooth, luminous finish.
[GENTLE FORMULA SAFE FOR SENSITIVE SKIN] Free from harsh additives, this mist soothes and nourishes while supporting the skin’s natural barrier. Ideal for daily use on sensitive skin.
[AUTHENTIC SUNGBOON EDITOR] Leading the K-beauty trend, SUNGBOON EDITOR provides specialized skincare solutions crafted with high-quality ingredients and a definite effect.
 
How To Use

1. Shake the mist to mix up the oil layer and moisture layer.
2. Spritz a moderate amount on the entire face.
3. Gently dab to aid absorption.
 
Key Ingredients

Collagen Extract (60%), Water, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glycereth-26, Triethyl Citrate, Betaine, Trehalose, Caprylyl Glycol, Propanediol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Butylene Glycol, Adenosine, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Carbomer, Lavandula Oil, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Oil, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Bixa Orellana Seed Oil, Beta-Glucan, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Glycine, Serine, Glutamic Acid, Benzyl Glycol, Aspartic Acid, Leucine, Alanine, Lysine, Arginine, Tyrosine, Phenylalanine, Proline, Valine, Threonine, Isoleucine, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Histidine, Cysteine, Methionine, Anemarrhena Asphodeloides Root Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Copper Tripeptide-1, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Hexapeptide-9, Hyaluronic Acid, Raspberry Ketone, Nonapeptide-1

description:
Description

This hydrating mist instantly soothes sensitive skin to deliver lasting relief at any given time. Formulated with Jartbiome, our proprietary microbiome complex, to help strengthen, balance, and improve skin's defenses. Centella Rx soothes and protects sensitive skin while cicabond helps repair skin. - Cicabond™: Helps repair and rebuild damaged skin resulting from external stressors - Powered by Centella Rx to calm sensitive skin, reduce redness, and soothe irritation - All skin types / Ideal for sensitive skin
How To Use
Do not shake before use. Spray the mist evenly on your face whenever needed with your eyes closed. Use as a part of your skincare regimen or before/after makeup.
Key Ingredients
Water, Propanediol, Centella Asiatica Extract, Madecassoside, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugarcane) Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Sea Water, Zanthoxylum Piperitum Fruit Extract, Achillea Millefolium Extract, Alchemilla Vulgaris Extract, Anastatica Hierochuntica Extract, Malva Sylvestris (Mallow) Extract, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, Primula Veris Extract, Veronica Officinalis Extract, Houttuynia Cordata Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment, Chrysanthemum Coccineum Flower Extract, Eucalyptus Citriodora Oil, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-2 Oleate, Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Dipropylene Glycol, Octyldodeceth-16, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Panthenol, Asiaticoside, Sodium Pca, Asiatic Acid, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Madecassic Acid, Magnesium Pca, 1,2-Hexanediol, Zinc Pca, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Manganese Pca, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Disodium EDTA

description:
Description

An energy-recharging, mineral-rich mist with a blend of 81% deep seawater and plant-based oils.
Further enriched with five kinds of seaweed extract for soothing and moisturizing effects.
Helps brighten dull skin tone while diminishing the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines.
Skin irritation test completed.

How To Use
Shake well before use.
Spritz on to clean face or at any time of the day to soothe and refresh the skin. 

Key Ingredients
Dental Silica, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Benzoate, Brilliant Blue FCF, Tartrazine, D-Sorbitol Solution, Sodium Carboxymethyl Cellulose, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Titanium Dioxide, Ascorbic Acid, Xylitol, Enzymatically Modified Stevia Glucosyl Stevia, Menthol, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Oil, Foeniculum Vulgare (Fennel) Oil, Cinnamomum Cassia (Cinnamon) Leaf Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Yucca Schidigera Leaf/Root/Stem Extract, Glycyrrhiza Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Extract, Curcuma Longa Extract, Fragrance, Purified Water

description:
Description

A fine mist makeup setting spray to keep your makeup in place all day.
How To Use
Spray onto face from about 20-30cm away before and after makeup application. Wait about 30 seconds - 1 minute so a protective layer can form. 

Make sure to clean the nozzle after usage. When you feel that the mist is weak or not spreading evenly, remove the nozzle and clean it with warm water.


Key Ingredients


Water, Polyester-5, Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Polyglyceryl-2 Oleate, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Octyldodeceth-16, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Bambusa Vulgaris Water, Fragrance(Parfum), Ethylhexylglycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Benzoate, Dipropylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Centella Asiatica Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Polysaccharides

description:
Description

A facial mist that instantly boosts the moisture level of your delicate skin. 
The soothing properties of centella asiatica, tea tree, and honeysuckle flower calm skin irritation. 
Formulated with bamboo extract, panthenol, and hyaluronic acid to replenish the skin with moisture. 
Further enriched with AHA and PHA derived from fruits to soften dead skin cells gently. 
Contains EWG-verified, safe ingredients only. 
Skin irritation test completed.  
Key Ingredients

Purified Water, Propanediol, Dipropylene Glycol, Trehalose, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Pentylene Glycol, Panthenol, C12-14 Pareth-12, Sodium Citrate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Allantoin, Gluconolactone, Centella Asiatica Extract, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Extract, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Bambusa Vulgaris Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate.

description:
Description

-A nourishing and hydrating ampoule mist that conveys the rich nutrition of Noni, vitalizing the skin with elasticity.
-The mist contains Noni Extract and Noni Seed Oil, providing sturdy moisture and ample nutrition to the skin.
-The ampoule particles are sprayed evenly and lightly, smearing smoothly into the skin without stickiness. 

Suggested Use

1. Spray on your face from a distance of 10-15cm. (Close the eyes and mouth during application)
2. Leave it to be absorbed into your skin and let dry.
3. Can be used after cleansing before moisturizing, or throughout the day over makeup.

Ingredients

Morinda Citrifolia Fruit Extract, Butylene Glycol, Water, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Peel Extract, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Copper Tripeptide-1, Morinda Citrifolia Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Ceramide NP, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Squalane, Phytosphingosine, Polyglutamic Acid, Cholesterol, Diethoxyethyl Succinate, Coconut Acid, Polyquaternium-51, Proline, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Adenosine, Dextrin, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Disodium EDTA, Chlorphenesin

description:
Description


Cooling sensation just like a rain shower in mid-summer! Fine spray mist provides deep nourishment and cooling hydration to exhausted skin. 
Made with antioxidant-rich bamboo and skin regenerating beta glucan for firmer and smoother looking skin. 
Quick absorbing formula packed with pure blend of naturally fermented black bamboo and bamboo shoot extract. 
Perfect for all skin types, especially those with dehydrated and easily irritated skin. who wants an immediate dose of healing moisture 
95% naturally derived ingredients, Cruelty Free, Vegan Friendly, Skin irritation test completed

Suggested Use


Shake and hold the bottle 15 - 25 cm away from face and mist. Use anytime throughout the day to freshen up skin.



Ingredients


Water, Glycerin, Betaine, Propanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Phyllostachys Nigra Leaf Extract (500 ppm), Bambusa Vulgaris Shoot Extract (2,000ppm), Phyllostachys Pubescens Shoot Bark Extract (2,000ppm), Sodium Phytate, Ethanol, Beta-glucan, Aspergillus Ferment Extract Filtrate,  Zanthoxylum Piperitum Fruit Extract, Pulsatilla Koreana Extract, Usnea Barbata (Lichen) Extract, Polyglyceryl-10 laurate, Polyglyceryl-10 myristate, Fragrance, Geraniol, Linalool, Limonene.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.content: I bought this for my winter skincare routine in Florida. This product is so good, I used the whole jar! I struggle with hormonal acne break outs, dryness (in winter), uneven texture, fine lines, and ingrown hairs. It's thick in the jar but sits light on the skin.

reviews.content: This is a new product for me. I have been a fan of Time Revolution, but wanted to branch out and find a smaller bottle to take with me during the day. This cools and refreshes--my two desires for this type of product. You get the immediate dewy look, which is nice, too.
